status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description: Create a basic test app to show off the new API changes that facilitate dynamic styling
fields.summary: Create a basic dynamic styling test app

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/163
The app: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/tree/master/test/apps/advanced/dynamic_styling

In terms of "review" for this, please verify that it is useful in terms of understanding the new functionality and APIs involved with dynamic styling. The app, the source code, and the console log should work together to give a distinct picture of exactly how the new functionality works and how you can use it in your apps. Please continue any discussion along these lines in this comment thread.
